thread.title: 'Real Housewives of Beverly Hills' Alum Yolanda Hadid Lands New Reality Show
thread.title_full: 'Real Housewives of Beverly Hills' Alum Yolanda Hadid Lands New Reality Show

author: Philiana Ng
title: 'Real Housewives of Beverly Hills' Alum Yolanda Hadid Lands New Reality Show
text:
'Real Housewives of Beverly Hills' Alum Yolanda Hadid Lands New Reality Show by Philiana Ng 1:08 PM PDT, March 21, 2017 Photo: Getty Images Yolanda Hadid has booked her first post- Real Housewives of Beverly Hills gig. 
The 53-year-old former model and reality star will lead a new Lifetime unscripted series about teen models, tentatively titled Model Moms , the cable network announced Tuesday. 
RELATED: Yolanda Hadid Gushes Over Gigi and Bella's Victoria's Secret Fashion Show Moment On Model Moms , Yolanda and her modeling expertise will be front and center as she coaches aspiring teen models to succeed on and off the catwalk. Yolanda and a team of experts will put the girls and their “momagers” through an eight-week training program, focused on the physical, mental and emotional wellness that it takes to build a brand. The models will be competing for a $5,000 weekly prize to put toward their future careers, with the lone girl left standing winning a management contract with Yolanda’s company and the possibility of being represented by IMG Models, which represents Yolanda’s children, daughters Gigi and Bella , and son Anwar. 
Though at the moment, Yolanda’s children aren’t expected to make appearances on the new show, it certainly would be a nice boost! 
RELATED: Gigi and Bella Hadid Send Birthday Messages to 'Beautiful' Mom Yolanda Back in November, ET was with Yolanda in Paris ahead of the 2016 Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show, which Gigi and Bella were walking in. “I’m just so proud and grateful that we get the opportunity as a family to experience this in this moment in time,” Yolanda said. “It’s amazing. I’m just as fascinated as everybody else.” 
Meanwhile, Lifetime has also ordered a new unscripted series from host Cat Deeley , titled This Time Next Year , which follows the journeys of ordinary people as they embark on extraordinary missions to change their lives, over the course of one year. 
RELATED: Cher to Star in Lifetime Movie About Flint Water Crisis Additionally, Melissa Joan Hart directs the new Lifetime movie, Watcher in the Woods, starring Angelica Huston ; Cher leads the cast for Flint ; and Elizabeth Smart narrates an upcoming biopic about her 2002 abduction. 
Previously announced TV movies Michael Jackson: Searching for Neverland will air May 29 at 8 p.m. ET/PT, Courtney Love ’s Menendez: Blood Brothers will premiere June 10 at 8 p.m. ET/PT and Kyra Sedgwick ’s directorial debut , starring husband Kevin Bacon and daughter Sosie Bacon, will air July 23 at 8 p.m. ET/PT. 
For more on Yolanda Hadid's relationship with daughters Gigi and Bella, watch the video below.
